word_mean: 先锋霉素，头孢菌素：由真菌头孢霉产生的一组相对抗青霉素酶的广谱抗生素，具有共同的主核7-氨基头孢烷酸，结构与青霉素有关。医学上应用的头孢菌素是天然头孢菌素C的半合成衍生物

means.word_mean: 1. one of several broad spectrum antibiotic substances obtained from fungi and related to penicillin (trade names Mefoxin); addition of side chains has produced semisynthetic antibiotics with greater antibacterial activity
